short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No need to search for coupons & deals. Get them right in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Legendeals finds you the best coupons and deals from small businesses throughout the UK.

Installing our browser extension means you get these deals right in your browser.

No need to search for coupons and deals - just visit your chosen site as normal, and your browser extension will highlight available deals for this company.
